functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Teravolt","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 3","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Sends raw electric power to devastate nearby foes, particularly those who are Ionized.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Teravolt",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Teravolt",author:"Thundermaster Baanon",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"The dragon, now charged from the previous spell, was torn asunder by a blast of raw electricity. Thus, Baanon earned his name - Thundermaster.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Azit spyrs ouf ekele, lynd my thyn powre!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Great spirits of electricity, lend me your power!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Summon Earth Elemental","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 3","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Calls forth a standard Earth Elemental from the elemental planes; its impact will also damage nearby foes.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Summon Earth Elemental",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Summon Earth Elemental",author:"Earthmaster Jabhar",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"A rift opened, and in an instant a monster of earth came smashing into the ground, knocking my foes flying. The spell appears to have worked.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Azit byest ouf erre, hyd myn cahl!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Great beast of earth, heed my call!)"}]']}
